\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 2014}

\subsection*{A Spooky Experience}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{R.J. Student Nurse}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 25 mg & oral & Mandrake & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 69.00 kg\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}

The taste: absolutely disgusting. Trust your intuition regarding dose - pour a load into a saucepan, add water, boil \& simmer for 20 minutes, strain, add a generous amount of honey and have a piece of fruit ready for afterwards. Be prepared to go for a pretty violent shit at some point. You need to have a healthy constitution before taking this. Senses are heightened, there's are feeling of paranoia, edginess, nervousness, urgency too, like Something's about to happen. I had it one Saturday night. It kicks in suddenly, say 3 hours later. I had the sudden urge to go and see the late show of Sleepy Hollow - before wandering around my (mostly deserted) halls of residence feeling like Jack Nicholson in The Shining. But\ldots \ldots .. next morning, a most pleasant hangover feeling, all nice and relaxing and a feeling that almost anything is possible. 



However, a friend had some and all she got was the trots!!!!

\end{document}
